meanings.definition: The large muscle in the upper arm that flexes the elbow joint.
meanings.sent1: He felt a sharp pain in his bicep after lifting heavy boxes.
meanings.sent2: She admired his toned bicep as he lifted the weights effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The bicep seemed to have a mind of its own, showing off its strength.
meanings.sent4: His bicep was like a coiled spring, ready to unleash power at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The bicep bulged with every movement, a testament to his hard work at the gym.
